description: This dataset contains personal details of individuals, including name, age, gender, birth date, identification number (kennitala), income, and email address.

Name.description: Full name of the individual, including first and last name.

Age.description: Age of the individual in years, expressed with decimal precision.

Gender.description: Gender of the individual (e.g., Male, Female).

Birth Date.description: Birth date of the individual in ISO format.

Kennitala.description: Icelandic national identification number for the individual, unique to each person.

Income.description: Yearly income of the individual in thousands ISK, expressed as a floating-point number.
